column4: I install feisty fawn 7.04 using alternate Cd but no sound? help
, what card , and check lspci , and demsg
It is aapple  ppc dual processor Mac
, you need the ppc version i think?
, or is it the new intel mac?
Live CD no problem, alternate CD problem
, you know how to do an lspci , on the terminal?
i have to go, but try lsmod | grep snd ,and see if the module is loaded
then ask agian here ... to get the module for your card loaded
